job_details.Functieomschrijving:
At Databricks, our core values are at the heart of everything we do; creating a culture of proactiveness and a customer-centric mindset guides us to create a unified platform that makes data science and analytics accessible to everyone. We aim to inspire our customers to make informed decisions that push their business forward. We provide a user-friendly and intuitive platform that makes it easy to turn insights into action and fosters a culture of creativity, experimentation, and continuous improvement. You will be an essential part of this mission, using your technical expertise to demonstrate how our Databricks Data Intelligence Platform can help customers solve their complex data challenges. You'll work with a collaborative, customer-focused team that values innovation and creativity, using your skills to create customized solutions to help our customers achieve their goals and guide their businesses forward. Join us in our quest to change how people work with data and make a
   better world!

   You will be reporting to the Manager, Field Engineering.

   The impact you will have:
     * Form successful relationships with clients throughout your assigned territory to provide technical and business value in collaboration with an Account Executive and a Senior Solutions Architect.
     * Gain excitement from clients about Databricks through hands-on evaluation and Spark programming, integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications.
     * Contribute to building the Databricks technical through engagement at workshops, seminars, and meet-ups.
     * Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design.
     * Support your customers by authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications.
     * Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect with the goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Architect.
job_details.full_text:
Sr. Solutions Engineer

At Databricks, our core values are at the heart of everything we do; creating a culture of proactiveness and a customer-centric mindset guides us to create a unified platform that makes data science and analytics accessible to everyone. We aim to inspire our customers to make informed decisions that push their business forward. We provide a user-friendly and intuitive platform that makes it easy to turn insights into action and fosters a culture of creativity, experimentation, and continuous improvement. You will be an essential part of this mission, using your technical expertise to demonstrate how our Databricks Data Intelligence Platform can help customers solve their complex data challenges. You'll work with a collaborative, customer-focused team that values innovation and creativity, using your skills to create customized solutions to help our customers achieve their goals and guide their businesses forward. Join us in our quest to change how people work with data and make a
   better world!

   You will be reporting to the Manager, Field Engineering.

   The impact you will have:
     * Form successful relationships with clients throughout your assigned territory to provide technical and business value in collaboration with an Account Executive and a Senior Solutions Architect.
     * Gain excitement from clients about Databricks through hands-on evaluation and Spark programming, integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications.
     * Contribute to building the Databricks technical through engagement at workshops, seminars, and meet-ups.
     * Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design.
     * Support your customers by authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications.
     * Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect with the goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Architect.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on customer engagement, technical advisory, and pre-sales activities, rather than the core development, implementation, or MLOps of AI/ML models. While it mentions 'data science and analytics' and 'Spark programming', it lacks specific details about building, training, or deploying generative AI models or predictive systems, which are central to ML Engineer and GenAI Engineer roles. The role appears to be more of a pre-sales technical consultant or solutions architect, aligning with the 'Ambiguous' profile as it's not a core AI/ML development role.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding customer challenges and providing technical and business value, aligning technical solutions with customer goals.
The role involves guiding customers and helping them achieve their business objectives.
The role aims to help customers make informed decisions that advance their business.
job_tasks.phrase: make informed decisions that push their business forward

job_tasks.justification: The role involves working with data challenges and Spark programming, which are foundational to data engineering.
The role requires hands-on experience with Spark programming, a key tool in big data processing and engineering.
The role mentions 'data science and analytics' and acting as a 'Big Data Analytics advisor', implying involvement with analytical models.
The role requires advising on architecture and design in the context of Big Data Analytics.
job_tasks.phrase: Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design

job_tasks.justification: The role involves integrating with the cloud ecosystem and third-party applications, which requires software integration skills.
job_tasks.phrase: integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications

job_tasks.justification: The role involves authoring reference architectures and demo applications, which are forms of software development output.
job_tasks.phrase: authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications

job_tasks.justification: The role focuses on pre-sales and customer solutions, not on building or maintaining production-grade ML/GenAI systems.

soft_skills.phrase: Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect
